title: Introducing: CLAY
body:
**CLAY’s** debut, _WildThing / 3’s a Crowd_ comes in two parts – merging elements of early 00’s R&B with some super slick pop production.

With her soulful vocal taking centre stage, it almost feels like the track should be part of a concept album of sorts – big songwriting, even bigger potential. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
